message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. I'm initially proposing a price of $1,100,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, of course, but I believe this is a fair starting point given its potential worth to your business.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I understand your budget constraints, the value of this product is significant and I believe my initial offer was already very fair.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,050,000.  This is my final offer, as I already have another interested buyer.

I've considered your latest offer, Alice. While I respect your position, I am still constrained by my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,000,000. I hope this might be acceptable to you, considering the product's value to me.
